# SOURCE: EgyptERA (egyptera.org/en/Tarr: # SEASONAL_NOTE: Egyptian commercial/industrial electricity tariffs do NOT have seasonal (summer/winter) rate variations per EgyptERA official tariff schedules.

# LOGIC: Agricultural/irrigation tariffs (200 pt/kWh Aug 2024) increased by 16.5% to match industrial flat rate (233 pt/kWh Aug 2024). Peak/off-peak differentials maintained from agricultural schedule. Represents unsubsidized full-cost-recovery pricing for communities without agricultural electricity access.

# ASSUMPTIONS: (1) Commercial/industrial rates are consistently 16.5% higher than agricultural across all years; (2) Peak/off-peak ratio structure remains the same as agricultural; (3) Exchange rates identical to agricultural dataset
# DATA_QUALITY: MODERATE - Based on verified Aug 2024 differential between agricultural (200 pt) and industrial (233 pt) rates; historical markup ratio assumed constant
# COMPARISON_TO_SUBSIDIZED: Unsubsidized rates are 1.165x subsidized agricultural rates
egyptera.org/en/Tarrif2024N.aspx): reflecting removal of agricultural electricity subsidy

# SOURCE: EgyptERA (egyptera.org/en/Tarr: # TARIFF_REFORM_TIMELINE: Same as agricultural tariffs - PM Decree 1257/2014 began subsidy removal; extended to 2024-2025 due to COVID-19; Aug 2024 increases implemented
